steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4br2q","text":"Add  following materials to 1.8 ml centrifuge tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8frng","text":"250 mg soil","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3c4h4","text":"1.5 g Bead","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drbma","text":"800 µl SD1","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b13d5","text":"Vortex for   at max speed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"417iq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehvs0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7mcr2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"27E983003D7B11EDA1CDF30E2372A14B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e2s9k","text":"Vortex horizontally and ensure the cap is tightly sealed","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ah5n","text":"Transfer the supernatant  to a clean 1.5 ml or 2 ml tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"143cu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jqup","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5h8nv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bnbr3","text":"Expect 500–600 µl","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c53pb","text":"Add 200 ul SD2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmhqq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dmkj5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5nq2i","text":"White precipitate forms.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ff7ea","text":"If too much AlCl3 (SD2) is added, it will cause all the DNA to be precipitated along with the inhibitory substances.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dkt9f","text":"See Mustafa (2017) for more info.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6eblj","text":" ","type":"atomic"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2pj3r","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"authors":"Irfan Mustafa, Hadiatullah and Sustiyah","can_edit":1,"date":"1495013520","doi":"doi.org/10.1063/1.4983434","guid":"354792503D7E11EDA1CDF30E2372A14B","id":2021,"journal":"AIP Conference Proceedings","protocol_id":null,"title":"Removal of humic acid from peat soils by using AlCl3  prior to DNA extraction"},"mutability":"IMMUTABLE","type":"citation"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5jqms","text":"Transfer the supernatant to a clean 1.5 ml or 2 ml tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gm9a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8rcjq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f09ni","text":"Expect 500–600 µl","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
